data.meaning_mnemonic: The <radical>direction</radical> your <radical>gun</radical> is facing leads straight to a block of <radical>tofu</radical>. This might be a sign you need to take a <kanji>trip</kanji>. If you're out there pointing guns at tofu, you're probably a little… tired… and in need of a change of scenery. Take a trip!
data.meaning_hint: Imagine coming to your senses after shooting up a block of tofu for stress relief or whatever you were doing. Yeah, you gotta get away from tofu for a while… It's definitely time for a relaxing trip.
data.reading_mnemonic: So, where do you go on your <kanji>trip</kanji>? To <reading>Rio</reading> (りょ). You had to go way down south to get as far away as possible from tofu. Ahh, nothing like a nice trip to Rio!
data.reading_hint: Imagine soaking up the sun on the beaches of Rio de Janeiro. Rio has its fair share of guns, but at least there's a lot less tofu around these parts.
